name: The Bard's Tale Trilogy

files.setup: N/A: Please select the setup.exe downloaded from GOG.com

content:
files:
- setup: 'N/A: Please select the setup.exe downloaded from GOG.com'
game:
  appid: 843260
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/The Bard's Tale Trilogy/TheBardsTaleTrilogy.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOGUI
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
